card.name: Claw
card.text: +3 attack, When you attack an opponent's hero, you can add a card from your discard pile to your hand except "Taxes" and it cannot be played that turn.

card.name: Seaweave Boat
card.text: +2 AC, As an action you can select an opponent, then you both randomly choose a card in each others hand to discard.

card.name: Wilhelm
card.text: When this card is played, equip a tax gold from a players deck to this card. When this dies, attach the tax gold to Aiged.

card.name: Taxes
card.text: Choose an opponent and search their deck, if you find a "Tax Gold" card, attach it to Aiged.

card.name: Tax Gold
card.text: Draw 2 cards. When played or discarded, attach it to Aiged.

card.name: Battle Miniatures
card.text: Opponents cannot target you with cards and attacks while you have this minion on your field.

card.name: Fire Breath
card.text: Choose up to 5 minions or opponents of your choice and deal 2 damage to each of them, ignoring AC.

card.name: Planetar Form
card.text: Equip this to your hero until the end of your second turn. While equipped, you hero doesn't take damage when attacking and can use an action to heal 1d8.

card.name: This is a public Spa!
card.text: All minions on the field are returned to their owner's hands. If there are none draw, 2 cards instead.

card.name: Radiant Breath
card.text: Select an opponent, that opponent and their minions take 2 damage and cannot attack until the end of your next turn

card.name: Gold Eater
card.text: Select two cards in an opponents hand of your choice and discard them, any "Tax Gold" cards are attached to Aiged.

card.name: Human Form
card.text: Heal 1d4 and equip this to your hero until the end of your second turn. While equipped, when you draw a card during your draw phase you may place it at the bottom of your deck and draw another, once.

card.name: Divine Awareness
card.text: Select an opponent and look at their hand. If they are holding a "Tax Gold" card, they must discard one card of their choice.

card.name: Come Pick Us Up
card.text: Select an opponent then you and that opponent shuffle your hands into your decks, then draw cards equal to the amount shuffled + 1.

card.name: Tactical Minitures
card.text: If this minion is alive during your next beginning phase, destroy it and draw a card.

card.name: Heretical Divide
card.text: Until the end of your next turn, any time an opponent would either use an action or attack with a minion or hero, they must send the top card of their deck to the discard pile. Any "Tax Gold" sent it attached to Aiged instead.

card.name: Glaives
card.text: +1 Attack, When you attack a minion, your left over damage goes to the opponent

card.name: Fists
card.text: +1 attack, You can attack minions one more time per turn.

card.name: Longbow
card.text: +1 attack, While attacking, you take no damage in return once per turn.

card.name: Exotic Clothing
card.text: +1 AC

card.name: Action Surge (Akari)
card.text: You can play two additional cards during this action phase, draw a card.

card.name: Extra Attack
card.text: Your hero can make an additional attack during this combat phase

card.name: Second Wind
card.text: Heal 1d10 HP.

card.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
card.text: Equip this card to your hero. your hero can now equip two weapons at once.

card.name: Indomitable
card.text: When a player targets you with a card, put it back in there hand and make them play another card in their hand if able.

card.name: Fighting Spirit
card.text: Your Hero heals 1 HP and your attacks this turn do 1 more damage. Add +1 for each "Fighting Spirit" card you've played this game.

card.name: Elegent Courtier
card.text: Play another card from you hand and then your discard pile, then you and an opponent of your choice draws a card.

card.name: Tireless Spirit
card.text: Reshuffle all discarded "Fighting Spirit" cards back into your deck, then draw a card.

card.name: Rapid Strike
card.text: If you played a "Fighting Spirit" within your last turn, you can attack an amount of times equal to each "Fighting Spirit" card you've played this game.

card.name: Strength Before Death
card.text: Equip this card to your hero. If your hero is defeated, they heal 5 HP and it becomes your turn immediantly. Return to the proper turn order after your turn.

card.name: Unique Martial Techniques
card.text: Add a "Fighting Spirit" card from your deck or discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Martially Prepared
card.text: Draw 2 cards, then your hero can attack an amount of times equal to the amount of cards in your hand until the end of your turn.

card.name: Lasting Imprint
card.text: Discard a card and put it into your opponents hand, they cannot play it and must spend an action to discard it. During each of thats opponent's beginning phase, they take 1 damage.

card.name: Strong, Silent Type
card.text: Gain 2 AC until you attack.

card.name: Personal History
card.text: Cards in you hand and deck can't be manipulated by opponent cards until the end of your next turn, draw a card.

card.name: Lifestealing Sword
card.text: When you reach 20 health, equip this Weapon. +2 Attack, Whenever you attack with this weapon roll a d20, on a 20 you gain +5 attack and heal 5 HP

card.name: Ring of Protection
card.text: You can discard 3 cards during your turn as an action to equip this. +3 AC

card.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
card.text: When you take 6 or more damage on your turn, equip this. Heal 1 HP during your beginning phase and heal 1 HP during your end phase.

card.name: Irlen
card.text: When you hero is attacked, you can choose Irlen to be the target instead.

card.name: Hunter's Bane
card.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, place one in your hand and then place the rest in any order back on top of the deck.

card.name: Crimson Rite
card.text: Lose 5 HP, gain +1 attack permentally.

card.name: Mutual Suffering
card.text: Any damage you take until the end of your next turn, also effects an opponent of your choice as well.

card.name: Reconstruction
card.text: Heal 5 HP, and skip your next draw phase

card.name: Rapidity
card.text: Draw a card, and you can play another card this turn.

card.name: Lucky
card.text: Choose a card randomly in an opponents hand of your choice and discard it. Then discard the top card of that opponents deck.

card.name: Extra Attack
card.text: Your hero can make two attacks instead of one during this combat phase.

card.name: Second Wind
card.text: Heal 1d10 HP

card.name: Action Surge (Aleyna)
card.text: You can play two additional cards during this action phase, draw a card.

card.name: Improved Critical
card.text: The next attack your hero does, does double damage.

card.name: Cold Rite
card.text: roll 1d4, lose that much health and send the top card of your opponents deck to the discard pile.

card.name: Lightning Rite
card.text: roll 1d4, lose that much health and you can play an extra card on your next turn.

card.name: Rite Preparation
card.text: roll 1d4, lose that much health and search your deck for a card with "Rite" in the name, add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Binding
card.text: An opponent of your choice cannot draw any cards during their next turn.

card.name: Sweat and Blood
card.text: Lose 5 HP, Shuffle an opponent of your choice's hand back into their deck and have them draw 4 cards.

card.name: Show Up the Divine
card.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck and take 3 damage for each one discarded, this can't bring you below 1 health.

card.name: Remarkable Warrior
card.text: Choose up to 2 cards from both your hand and discard pile, shuffle them back into your deck and redraw. Take 2 damage for each card drawn.

card.name: Wand of the War Mage
card.text: When you have shuffled 3 spells back into your deck, equip this. Your hero's passive does 2 additional damage.

card.name: Pearl of Power
card.text: After you have played 4 spells from hand this game, equip this. Once per game, you can roll 1d4 and add up to that many spells from your discard pile to your hand. Those choosen spells don't count against you max hand size until used.

card.name: Irradianus Mundi
card.text: Once 8 spells have been in your discard pile, equip this. As an action, you can play a spell from your discard pile as long as there is 2 copies of it in the discard pile and isn't a reaction.

card.name: Canicus
card.text: The first time you cast a spell in a turn, you can play a spell from your discard pile.

card.name: Bend Luck
card.text: Choose a player and send one of their cards either on the field, hand, or top card of their deck to the discard pile.

card.name: Corrosive Cage
card.text: (Craftable) When drawn, place this card on the field. It is dormant and can't be effected. Whenever a "Crafting Component" card is played, attach to this card. When this card gets 2 "Crafting Components", it becomes no longer dormant and equips to the hero. While not dormant, you can use a reaction to trap a card being played inside. While trapped the card cannot be played, and it takes an action for the cards owner to add it back to their hand. Only one card can be held at a time.

card.name: Crafting Component
card.text: If you draw this card while not having a "Craftable" card on the field, shuffle this back into your deck a draw again. If there is a "Craftable" card in the field, play it immediately and your hero gains +1 AC permanently.

card.name: Finding Evidence
card.text: Equip to your hero. The first time you would play a non-comapnion card on a turn, set it outside the game instead of in the discard pile. Once you have 3 cards set aside, draw "Presenting Case"

card.name: Hexblade's Curse
card.text: Choose an enemy hero, equip this to them. Each instance of damage you deal with spells against that target will deal 1 more damage. When that hero dies, you heal 10 HP.

card.name: Preparing Ingredients
card.text: Take 2 cards of your choice out of the deck, shuffle your deck, and then place those 2 cards on top of the deck in any order. Draw 2 cards on your next turn.

card.name: Presenting a Case
card.text: If this is not drawn by "Finding Evidence", shuffle this card back into the deck and draw again. Play all 3 cards that are out of the game and then shuffle this card and "Finding Evidence" back into the deck.

card.name: Raven Queen's Fate
card.text: Take 3 cards of your choice out of the deck and place them in your hand, then shuffle the deck. These 3 cards don't count against you max hand size and you must discard 3 cards at the end of your next turn.

card.name: Sorcery Points
card.text: Add a card from your discard pile to your hand, then play another card.

card.name: Tides of Chaos
card.text: When your opponent plays a card, pick a card randomly from their hand to play instead. If "Wild Magic Surge" is in the discard pile, add it to your hand.

card.name: Wild Magic Surge
card.text: Roll a d20, on a 1 discard your hand, on a 2 to 10 you can play a spell from your discard pile and then add it to your hand, on a 11 to 19 you draw a card and then play a spell card from your hand, on a 20 you roll 2 more times (rerolling any 1s or repeat 20s.)

card.name: Agonizing Blast
card.text: Deal 1d4+2 damage to a enemy of your choice.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Draw a card and then remove the top card from an opponents deck of your choice.

card.name: Dimension Door
card.text: Take a another card in you hand and switch it out with a card of your choice in your deck, then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Repelling Blast
card.text: Select an enemy, Deal 2 damage to it and have its current player send a random card from their hand back to the top of their deck.

card.name: Telekinesis
card.text: Take up to two cards from your deck or discard pile and add it to your hand, then look in your opponents hand and shuffle one of those cards into that player's deck.

card.name: Vortex Warp
card.text: Take a card on the field or hand and shuffle it into its owner's deck, or add a card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Roaring Deliverance
card.text: After Draveik has taken 3 attacks, equip this. +2 attack and when you hit but don't kill a minion, send it back to the top of the opponent's deck.

card.name: Deusiderre
card.text: If you spend 3 turns in a row taking no action, equip this weapon. +4 attack, you can use an action to sacrifice 10 HP to increase to +7 attack until the end of the turn.

card.name: Retribution Spine
card.text: After receiving a total of 4 damage while attacking, equip this. +1 AC, Any enemy that attacks your hero takes 1d4 damage

card.name: Second Wind
card.text: Heal 1d10 HP

card.name: Action Surge (Draveik)
card.text: You get two additional actions during this action phase, draw a card.

card.name: Indomitable
card.text: When a player targets you with a card, put it back in there hand and make them play another card in their hand if able.

card.name: Extra Attack
card.text: Your hero can make two attacks instead of one during this combat phase.

card.name: Fire Breath (Draveik)
card.text: Roll 1d6, deal that much damage to all enemies

card.name: Land Strider Deft Explorer
card.text: Take two cards from your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck, then draw one./ Draw 2 cards, then shuffle one card from your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Absorb Elements
card.text: When you are dealt damage, roll 1d6 and subtract from that instance of damage. On your next attack, add 1d6 damage to the attack.

card.name: Zephyr Strike
card.text: Draw a card, your next attack this turn deals an extra 1d4 damage.

card.name: Last Ditch Effort
card.text: Deal 10 to yourself and then if you are alive, deal 10 to your opponent.

card.name: Quality Build
card.text: Until the start of your next turn, your attack or AC is equal to your highest other stat of attack or AC.

card.name: Sealed Dielong
card.text: You can take 5 damage to summon this when discarded.

card.name: Unsealed Dielong
card.text: you can take 5 damage to summon this when discarded.

card.name: Winter
card.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card

card.name: Daennis
card.text: Whenever your hero attacks, draw a card, then you can discard one.

card.name: Blind Vengeance Pure Intent
card.text: Discard 1 card and draw 2./ Draw 1 card

card.name: Goading Grappling Strike
card.text: Until the start of your next turn, gain +2 attack and everytime you are damaged, discard a card and gains another 2 attack./ Each opponent you attack next skips their draw phase.

card.name: Slayers Prey
card.text: Choose an enemy, your next attack(s) against them in a turn deals an extra 1d6 of damage.

card.name: Know Your Enemy Favored Foe
card.text: Choose an opponent and look into their hand, then discard one of your own cards. Your opponent must discard a card of the same type if possible./ Choose an opponent, until the start of your next turn whenever they play a card, draw a card, then you may discard one.

card.name: Strong Will Conflicting Ideals
card.text: Discard any amount of cards from your hand, your hero gains 2 attack + 2 more for each card discared this turn./ The next time you are attacked, deal 3 additional retaliation damage

card.name: Feinting Precision Attack
card.text: Discard another card, your hero's next attack deals 1d6 more damage and can reroll any rolled damage by your hero once this turn only./ Your next attack ignores AC.

card.name: Pushing Attack Sweeping Strike
card.text: Discard a card, your opponent must put one card in their hand on top of their deck and one of their cards on the field into their hand if possible. / When you attack with your hero, deal that damage to an additionaly opponent or enemy minion of your choice.

card.name: Arena Ward
card.text: After have taken 2 instances of damage, equip this. +2 attack, on your turn as an action, you can take a summoned spider from your discard pile or deck and put in on your field.

card.name: Diadem
card.text: After having summoned two minions this game, equip this. When you summon a minion, look at the top card of an opponents deck of your choice. If its a minion, you can summon it to your side of the field but pass control back to its owner at the end of the turn.

card.name: Summoned Spiders
card.text: nan

card.name: Palppy
card.text: When this dies from an opponent, shuffle this card into your deck instead.

card.name: Nadia
card.text: When this dies, you can play "Lolth's Champion" from anywhere without sacrificing a minion on your next turn.

card.name: Jeremiah
card.text: When this dies, shuffle this into the opponents deck. When drawn it is summoned to your field, they draw again.

card.name: Hesli Arachnea
card.text: When this is summoned, add a minion from your deck to your hand or give your hero +2 attack and +2 AC until the end of your turn.

card.name: To the Promised Land
card.text: Everyone discards their hand, then they draw 4 cards.

card.name: Reliable Talent
card.text: Any damage your hero does before the end of your next turn, cannot be reduced in anyway. Including AC.

card.name: Uncanny Dodge
card.text: Any time you or a minion would take damage, half the damage.

card.name: Evasion
card.text: Ignore the next instance of damage you take, This stays until you would take damage.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: If you had a minion die within the last turn, your next attack this turn deals an additional 2d6 damage.

card.name: Elven Accuracy
card.text: Until the end of your next turn, you can roll an additional time for rolled damage and take the higher roll.

card.name: Magically Non-magical
card.text: Check the top card of your deck, then either play it or add it to your hand. If it was not a minion, draw again once.

card.name: Lolth's Champion
card.text: If you have at least one minion on your field, sacrifice it, your next attack does 3d6 damage.

card.name: Thief's Reflexes
card.text: During another opponents turn, you can play a card during their action phase. You choose when it gets played.

card.name: Lucky
card.text: Choose a card randomly in your opponents hand and discard it. Then discard the top card of your opponents deck.

card.name: Fast Hands Potion
card.text: Choose a minion in you discard pile and add it to your hand. If there are none, draw a card instead.

card.name: 30 to Stealth
card.text: Skip your combat phase this turn, you and your minions are immune to damage until the start of your next turn, then add a sneak attack from your deck to your hand.

card.name: Sabotage
card.text: When an opponent or opponent's minion attacks you or one of your minions, force them to attack another opponent. If there is none, they lose their attack

card.name: Reaction Sneak Attack
card.text: When an opponenent hero attacks one of your minions, you immediately make an attack against them that does an additional 2d6 damage.

card.name: Antithesis
card.text: When one of your companions die, equip this. +2 attack, reaction 1/game negate one effect targeting one of your companions

card.name: Oakhardt's Vestment
card.text: Once you have taken 10 damage for your companions, equip this. +2 AC, reaction 1/game change the target of one spell or effect to Michael if applicable

card.name: Banner of Safe Haven
card.text: Once you have played 3 aura cards, equip this. When one of your minions takes damage, roll a d4, reduce the damage by that amount.

card.name: Bol Wyrtson
card.text: At the start of your beggining phase, restore this companion to full health

card.name: Harry Oakhardt
card.text: When this companion attacks, draw a card

card.name: Vela Venta
card.text: Your hero does not take retaliation damage.

card.name: Aura of Protection
card.text: (Aura) Equip this to your hero until the end of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to you and your minions by 2.

card.name: Aura of Vitality
card.text: (Aura) Equip this to your hero until the start of your next turn, If any of your companions die, return them to the field at the start of your action phase with 1 life.

card.name: Crusader's Mantel
card.text: (Aura) Equip this to your hero until the start of your next turn, your hero and companions gain +2 attack.

card.name: Blinding Smite
card.text: Your Hero and Vela Venta’s next attack this turn deals 2 extra damage, and the target hit cannot attack until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Revivify
card.text: Discard a card, choose a companion in your discard pile and place them onto the field.

card.name: Summon Steed
card.text: Search your deck or discard pile for Vela Venta and put them onto the field.

card.name: Wrathful Smite
card.text: Your Hero and Vela Venta’s next attack this turn deals 1 extra damage, and the target hit cannot target your hero until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Build Your House
card.text: Your hero gains +1 AC till the start of your next turn. Each time your hero would take damage before the start of your next turn, draw 1 card.

card.name: Divine Smite
card.text: Your hero's and Bol Wyrtson’s next attack this turn deals 2 extra damage.

card.name: Familiar Face Gung-Ho
card.text: Search your deck for Bol Wyrston and put him onto the field. If Bol is already on the field, he may take an extra attack this turn and heal your hero 5 HP.

card.name: I Go Low, You Go High
card.text: If Bol Wyrtson is in play, both Your hero and Bol gain +1 attack and attack a signle target of your choice. Neither you hero of Bol takes retaliation damage.

card.name: Lay On Hands
card.text: You hero or one friendly companion of your choice regains 4 health.

card.name: Like Father Like Sons
card.text: If Harry Oakhardt is in play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put any amount in your hand or discard. For how many were discarded, Harry and your hero gain that much additional attacks

card.name: Prodigal Son Poem for Your Thoughts
card.text: Search your deck for Harry Oakhardt and put him onto the field. If he is already in play, your companions gain 1d4 attack and AC until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Relentless Avenger
card.text: when an enemy attacks one of your companions, Your hero immediately attacks them and deals an additional 1d6 damage.

card.name: Shield Master
card.text: ignore the next damage you would take.

card.name: Zeitherz
card.text: when you cast a spell, you can discard 2 card to cast it twice.

card.name: Staff of Power
card.text: when you cast a spell, it does 1 additional damage.

card.name: Cloak of invisibility
card.text: as an action you can discard a card and can't be targeted by attacks or spells until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Familiar
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.

card.name: Flying Carpet
card.text: Whenever you draw a card(s) outside your draw phase, you can play 1 additional card this turn.

card.name: Flying Broom
card.text: When this is in the discard pile, as an action summon this to your field and draw a card.

card.name: Shield
card.text: gain 5 AC till the start of your next turn.

card.name: Cone of Cold
card.text: each opponent can choose to take 6 damage or skip their next draw phase.

card.name: Crown of Stars
card.text: Discard any amount of cards of your choice from your hand, for each one discarded deal 1d4 damage to an opponent of your choice.

card.name: Meteor Swarm
card.text: Discard your hand and for every 2 cards in your discard pile, deal 2 damage to all enenmies. If you deal 6 damage, draw 1 card.

card.name: Counter Spell
card.text: Draw a card and then remove the top card from an opponents deck of your choice.

card.name: Mage Armor
card.text: Equip to your hero, gain +2 AC

card.name: Tidal Wave
card.text: Choose an enemy hero, deal 1d4 damage to them and then draw a card. If that opponent had any minions, they cannot attack you until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Flash of Geniuess
card.text: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Empowered Evocation
card.text: Any damage you do with a spell this turn does 1 additional damage, you can play another spell card this turn.

card.name: Overchannel
card.text: Discard 3 cards, Until the end of your next turn, damage from spells is doubled.

card.name: Keen Mind
card.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, choose 2 among then and place those in your hand, discard the rest.

card.name: Alexander William James Arroyo the 6th
card.text: Discard a card from your hand, You can play 2 additional cards this turn only.

card.name: Touched by Time
card.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your discard pile and add a spell from among them to your hand, shuffle the rest into you deck.

card.name: Dad's Bank Account
card.text: Take a card from you hand and place it outside the game. 1 to 3 turns after this card is played, use an action to add the card to your hand a draw an amount of cards equal to the number of your turns that passed.

card.name: Correlon's Blessing
card.text: Equip this to your hero. Spell Cards in your hand and discard pile can't be effected by opponents. (If a card makes you discard and you only have spells, you are unaffected)

card.name: Cloud Splitter
card.text: When you attack a minion, that minions owner takes equivalent damage.

card.name: Opulent Cindus
card.text: Once a game as an action you can choose to either draw 5 cards, gain +5 attack, or gain +5 AC until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Alexia
card.text: nan

card.name: Rovin
card.text: When this card is played from your hand, place a minion from your discard pile onto your field.

card.name: Laurent Thibolt
card.text: When this minion dies, draw a card.

card.name: Lewis the Dog
card.text: If this is in the discard pile, you can use an action to bring it back to the field.

card.name: Vonett the Chair
card.text: Opponents must attack this card before they can attack the cards owner.

card.name: Sorcery Points
card.text: Add a card from your discard pile to your hand, then play another card.

card.name: Bardic Inspiration
card.text: Roll 1d6, give one of your minions that much attack and AC until the end of your turn.

card.name: Tempestuous Magic
card.text: Draw a card, your hero cannot be targeted for attacks or spells until your next turn, and skip your combat phase for this turn.

card.name: Storm's Fury
card.text: when one of your minions is attacked, the attacker takes 1d4 damage for each minion on your field.

card.name: Vampiric Bite
card.text: Choose an opponent, then roll 1d4. Deal damage to the opponent and heal yourself equal to the number rolled. This damage ignores AC

card.name: Mobile Florish
card.text: On your next attack add 1d4 to it, then select a card randomly in the hand of the attacked opponent. They must shuffle it back into their deck.

card.name: Defensive Flourish
card.text: When an opponent uses an action, roll 1d6 and you gain attack and AC to the number rolled until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Slashing Flourish
card.text: When an opponent uses an action, roll 1d6 and you gain attack to the number rolled and when you attack next, choose one other target to take equivalent damage.

card.name: Gate
card.text: Search your deck and pick a card, then add that card to your hand.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.text: Select a minion in your discard pile and summon it to the field.

card.name: Mental Prison
card.text: Select an opponent, each time they play a card or attack with a hero or minion they take 1d10 damage until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Synaptic Static
card.text: Select an opponent, each time they do damage to another target with either an attack, ability, or spell, they subract 1d6 to the number.

card.name: Taking the Spotlight
card.text: You gain 4 AC and your minions are untargetable and immune to all effects until the start of your next turn. Your minions can't attack during this combat phase.

card.name: Theater Postings
card.text: Search the top 1d6 cards of your deck, place one minion onto the field and put the other cards onto the top of your deck in any order. The minion can't attack this turn.

card.name: Gathering Crowd
card.text: When this minion is summoned, search your deck for a minion and add it to your hand.

card.name: Pepperbox
card.text: While attacking, you take no damage in return.

card.name: Gauntlet
card.text: For each elemental gem in your discard pile, increase this attack by +1

card.name: Ring of Bards
card.text: As an action you can choose a card in your discard pile and play it.

card.name: Watermelon
card.text: nan

card.name: Ioun Stone
card.text: You have an additional action every turn, but can't use it to play a minion or spell card.

card.name: Tyreal Clone
card.text: When this dies, you can take a card in your hand and shuffle it into your deck, then draw a card.

card.name: Terry
card.text: Tyreal can play this card from anywhere.

card.name: Baefordrin
card.text: When played, add a non-minion card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Tenser's Transformation
card.text: Roll 1d12, You gain that much attack and AC until the end of this turn and then heal equal to half the roll rounded down.

card.name: Elemental Gem (Blue)
card.text: Discard the top card of your deck and gain an additional action.

card.name: Elemental Gem (Green)
card.text: Choose an opponent, send 2 random cards from either their hand or field into their deck and shuffle. They then draw 2.

card.name: Elemental Gem (Red)
card.text: Deal 1d6 damage to a target of your choice.

card.name: Elemental Gem (Yellow)
card.text: Gain 1d6 AC until the start of your next turn.

card.name: You Wouldn't Understand
card.text: Take a card of your choice from your hand or deck, and replace it with a card from an opponent's deck at random that isn't a minion. Then each player shuffles their deck.

card.name: Cutting Words
card.text: remove a random card from each opponents hand.

card.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
card.text: Send all minions on every field into their owner's hand. If an opponent doens't have minions, they must shuffle a card from their hand into their deck.

card.name: Lore Bard
card.text: Pick an opponent, choose to either have them trade one of their cards in their hand or on their field with one randomly in your hand.

card.name: Magical Secrets
card.text: Pick an opponent, look through their discard pile and play a non-minion card.

card.name: A Wishful Restoration
card.text: Take 2 cards from your discard pile and put them in you hand, then heal 5 HP.

card.name: Fabricate
card.text: Add 1 card from your deck to your hand, then shuffle your deck. If it wasn't a minion or spell, you gain 2 attack and AC until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Im the Cook Now
card.text: Choose an opponent, draw three cards from the top of their deck. Then that opponent chooses one to give you, discarding the rest.

card.name: 31 Passive
card.text: When your hero is attacked, stop the opponent's and make an attack against their hero with your own.

card.name: Inventor's Insight
card.text: Disable either a Weapon or Equipment of an opponent of your choice has equipped and gain its effects until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Chain Breaker
card.text: Everyone discards a card of their choice, this then becomes a minion with attack and AC equal to the total amount of cards that were discarded this turn.

card.name: Aiged
card.text: At the start of the game, shuffle 5 "Tax Gold" cards around into opponents decks at your own descretion. Once you have collected 5 Tax Gold you can destroy an opponent of your choice, then reshuffle all the taxes and gold tax again.

card.name: Akari
card.text: You always have +2 attack

card.name: Aleyna
card.text: Each time you take damage on your own turn, you gain +3 attack until you end your turn

card.name: Canton
card.text: You start the game with 5 cards in your hand. Whenever you cast a spell, deal 1d4 damage to an enemy of your choice.

card.name: Draveik
card.text: You always have +1 attack and AC

card.name: Gareth
card.text: Gareth cannot be targeted by opponent cards and attacks while you have minions on your field.

card.name: Michael
card.text: Whenever one of your companions would take damage, you can choose to take the damage instead.

card.name: Nathaniel
card.text: Maximum hand size is increased to 7 and starts the game with 5 cards

card.name: Praedyth
card.text: For each minion on your board, your hero has +2 attack and +1 AC

card.name: Tyrael
card.text: You have no limit to the amount of Weapons and Equipment you can have on at a time.
